snippet: “Vape” beats “slacktivism.” A business owner in Washington state says FEMA’s red tape is forcing her out of business. And why businesses need to change the way they accept payments.
abstract: “Vape” beats “slacktivism.” A business owner in Washington state says FEMA’s red tape is forcing her out of business. And why businesses need to change the way they accept payments.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Pastry, Coffee and Cats
